dc_title_s: General Land Office Township Plat: Linn County, Iowa; 84N 7W
dc_description_s: Part of a set of digitized microfilm of manuscript maps of Iowa townships. Individual maps in the set may include: Native American villages and fields; the first farmsteads, town sites and fields established by settlers; networks of trails; distribution of rivers, woods, prairies, wetlands and springs; and survey data such as creator, date created, and date accepted.
